接口的使用
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.CellBuilder

  • 使用CellBuilder的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase  

    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase中CellBuilder的使用

      org.apache.hadoop.hbase中CellBuilder的子接口 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      interface  ExtendedCellBuilder
      For internal purpose.
      interface  RawCellBuilder
      Allows creating a cell with Tag An instance of this type can be acquired by using RegionCoprocessorEnvironment#getCellBuilder (for prod code) and RawCellBuilderFactory (for unit tests).
      实现CellBuilder的org.apache.hadoop.hbase中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
